item.title: Any 1 kno how to fix guthans so it heals you?
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

good thing i made a tuterial on this
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265196.0.html[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 07:11:50 PM[/size][hr][quote=“red_rooster, post:1, topic:200561”]there is 2 ways to do this, a miscrandom way and a everytime way, ill will show bouth.
purpose: to make guthans heal (players and npc’s)

classes modified: client.java

open client.java and search

					double TotalExp = 0;

you should see something like this

                                        LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay;
					server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
					server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
					server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
					server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
					double TotalExp = 0;
                                        inCombat();

now under “incCombat()” add this

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);
NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}
}

alright, the “playerEquipment” is what items the player has to be wearing, if that is the case then it calls on this
“stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);”
is the graphic you see when you attack the npc,

pking/wep delay is how fast the wepon will hit

and the
“NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);”

is what adds the damge the player inflicts on to there health, this methad heals everytime, this one will be on a timer?

under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

add this

public void guthan() {
if(misc.random(2) == 1)
	{
stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);
sendMessage("You Drain Your Oponents Health");
NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
	}
}
}

this is the same code as before but if u look there is a “if(misc.random(2) == 1)”
this means when this void is called it will randomly select a number between 1 and 2, if the number is 1 it will call the methed. now to make this call when your attacking with full guthans.

im not telling you were to add this, you have to figure it out.

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
guthan();
}

well there you have it, 50%credit to who evermade the berserker neclace tut, for making the misc.random code, and 10% to that guy in develupment/help section for telling me were to add it, and 40% to me for posting this and putting it together.

~red_rooster, and i know my spelling is bad.[/quote]

Read full topic
